name: hyarcade
description: A full system for gathering and displaying peoples hypixel arcade games stats

scripts.buildconfig: cd packages/Config; git push; cd ../..;npm i eatmyvenom/hyarcade-config
scripts.buildrequest: cd packages/request; git push; cd ../..;npm i eatmyvenom/hyarcade-requests
scripts.buildlogger: cd packages/Logger; git push; cd ../..;npm i eatmyvenom/hyarcade-logger
scripts.buildstruct: cd packages/Structures; git push; cd ../..;npm i eatmyvenom/hyarcade-structures
scripts.buildutils: cd packages/Utils; git push; cd ../..;npm i eatmyvenom/hyarcade-utils
scripts.buildpkgs: npm run buildconfig; npm run buildrequest; npm run buildlogger; npm run buildstruct; npm run buildutils

author: EatMyVenom
